testsuite.name: com.ace.airbnb.SearchTest

testcase.name: test1_verifyAppliedFilters
testcase.system-out: Test 1: Verify that the results match the search criteria - applied filters are correct Check that location is: Rome Check number of guests is: 3 guests Check selected time interval is: Oct 24 – 31

testcase.name: test3_verifyPropertyOnMap
testcase.system-out: Verify that the property is displayed on the map and the color of the pin changes when hovering Get color of the first pin on page before hover: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1) Performed hover upon first property in the list background color for the pin after hover: rgba(36, 36, 36, 1) Click on the identified property on the map Verify that the details shown in the map popup are the same as the ones shown in the search results

testcase.name: test2_verifyExtraFilters
testcase.system-out: Click More filters Select the number of bedrooms as 5 Select Pool from the Facilities section. Click Show Stays Verify that the properties displayed on the first page have at least the number of selected bedrooms Property Villa Appia Antica-ZEN45 has 5 bedrooms Property Beautiful Villa in Rome - Frascati has 5 bedrooms Property Rental in Rome - Villa La Gallese (Gucci) has 6 bedrooms Property Tenuta 4 pini has 21 bedrooms Property Villa Anson Silj heritage residence for 14 people has 6 bedrooms Property Casale Ciarrocca has 6 bedrooms Property Luxury Villa Appia Antica has 5 bedrooms Property Rome Eur Luxury Villa has 6 bedrooms Open the details of the first property Check that 'Pool' option is displayed for property Villa Appia Antica-ZEN45

testcase.name: test1_verifyMaxNumberOfGuestOnEachProperty
testcase.system-out: Test 1: Verify that properties displayed on the first page can accommodate at least the selected number of guests Open page for each property and check number of guests is >= than 3 Guests allowed for property Casa Stella : 4 Guests allowed for property [YOUR HOME in ROME] Modern Apartment : 4 Guests allowed for property In a central and peaceful area near Trastevere : 3 Guests allowed for property DREAM CASTLE ROME 4 : 3 Guests allowed for property [Monteverde] Vittoria's Apartment : 4 Guests allowed for property [Appio Latino - Re di Roma] Palmi Roof Apartment : 4 Guests allowed for property Penthouse Via dei Coronari - Rome : 4 Guests allowed for property Apartment St. Peter's Way - Garden & Pool : 4 Guests allowed for property Apartment of the White Rose : 3 Guests allowed for property Aki's Flat |Wi-Fi • Terrazzo : 3 Guests allowed for property riverside apartment with terrace and garden : 6 Guests allowed for property 2 Minutes away from Tiburtina Station Self Checkin : 5 Guests allowed for property Leo Home : 3 Guests allowed for property Herons bright apartment close Metro Station : 4 Guests allowed for property THE COLOSSEUM'S VIEW (sanitized with ozone) : 4 Guests allowed for property Elegant and Cozy Flat with Study - Trastevere : 3 Guests allowed for property Rome Top Apartament : 3 Guests allowed for property Carpegna Park Apartment by Cornelia subway : 4
